post.author: Giwon Jeon
post.content:
Hello all,

Could anyone let me know about how to get to CFB Borden from Toronto airport or Korean town ? by bus or taxi ? I'm going to attend to the graduation parade of the basic military course. how far from Toronto ? and how long will it take to there ? the cheaper place to stay for 2 days (Mar 22nd to 24th) ? I really appreciate the people living in Toronto, who gave informations to my questions.

a country man from Halifax
post.title: ? Transport from Toronto airport to CFB Borden
